data.name: Elevator or stairs dilema
data.description:
I believe everyone who once lived in building with elevator had this dilema.
The classic I am late for (Work, School, Bus etc.) should i take the stairs to be faster.

You will be put into the situation of John he oversleeeps everytime and he always has to hurry for bus.

Your Task:
You will be given floor John lives on and Floor on which the elevator is.
You will be how many seconds he has until the bus leaves
Station is right out of the door so we will not count any exces time.
Elevator is quite a fast one and can clear 1 floor in 5 seconds but it takes him both 6 seconds to close and 6 seconds to open the doors.
Elevator always starts with open doors

John is also quite a fast one too as he can clear 1 floor in 10 seconds (down but also up) and as he was an athlete he doesnt get tired

Return True or False if John can make it to the bus
